sentences.english: The anaerobe resistance fungus medicine has the stable sensitivity.
sentences.chinese: 厌氧菌对抗菌药物有较稳定的敏感性。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of drug on chemical degradation of lipopolysaccharide (LPS) from oral anaerobes.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估各种药物对口腔厌氧菌内毒素的降解作用。

sentences.english: Then anaerobic bacteria take that nitrate and turn it into harmless nitrogen gas.
sentences.chinese: 最后厌氧菌将硝酸盐转化成无害的气体氮。

sentences.english: Furthermore, antibiotics had little effect on the mutation rate in bacteria grown under anaerobic conditions.
sentences.chinese: 此外，抗生素对厌氧菌的突变率几乎没有影响。

sentences.english: The oxygen is quickly used in the decay process, and anaerobic bacteria take over.
sentences.chinese: 腐烂过程中迅速消耗氧气，分解细菌由厌氧菌取代。

sentences.english: When the tide comes in, anaerobic bacteria, which need no oxygen, go to work.
sentences.chinese: 潮汐到来时，不需要氧气的厌氧菌就可以活动了。

sentences.english: Recombinant anaerobes can be utilized for any of the above purposes.
sentences.chinese: 重组可以利用厌氧菌对上述任何目的。

sentences.english: Surgical infections are mostly polymicrobial, involving both aerobes and anaerobes.
sentences.chinese: 通常有包括需氧菌和厌氧菌的多种菌。

definition: Gram negative (bacteria that do not retain Gram stain, often the more dangerous kind)
